channel.title: Help with my JFrame
channel.description:
Hi, on my client's JFrame I recently added a Notes Tab that can allow you to type things you need to remember when your playing the server and what not... I have it so my client reads the text in a file I made called "notes.txt" but ow can I make it so when I exit the client anything that you have in the notes tab is saved to "notes.txt" I know tis is very hard to understand but I will show you what I mean with a picture.
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/5l3tsk.png[/img]

item.title: Help with my JFrame
item.dc:creator: @Da_0wnz Da 0wnz
item.description:
@Da_0wnz wrote:

Hi, on my client’s JFrame I recently added a Notes Tab that can allow you to type things you need to remember when your playing the server and what not… I have it so my client reads the text in a file I made called “notes.txt” but ow can I make it so when I exit the client anything that you have in the notes tab is saved to “notes.txt” I know tis is very hard to understand but I will show you what I mean with a picture.
